name: Four-Armed Gargoyle
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons not made of adamantine

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one gore.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
